des: "I invented this recipe when I started running out of smoothie components.  I think it tastes like a cross between peaches and cream, and egg nog (there are no eggs in it though).  The oats and/or wheat germ can be omitted for a smoother smoothie. If using frozen peaches, omit the ice cubes."
ins: Place the peaches, ice, nutmeg, vanilla extract, honey, wheat germ, oats, and soy milk into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses to serve.
